channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Tiburon panel wants community feedback for positive-message street-sign art
item.description: Tiburon considers street-sign art with positive messages, but pushback prompts officials to seek more feedback and artist revisions.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon flood officials back $800k in design costs for creek restoration
item.description: Tiburon flood board backs design contracts for Bel Aire creek upgrades after trimming nearly $400K from original estimate.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Be Ready Belvedere honing city’s disaster prep
item.description: Be Ready Belvedere will host its first major emergency-preparedness event in October, teaching residents how to build go-bags as part of...
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Wing-foil instructor conquers Koa Kai Triple Crown
item.description: Paradise Cay paddle-foiler Josh Waldman completes grueling 75-mile Koa Kai Triple Crown in the Hawaiian islands.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A former tennis player finds new passion for pickleball
item.description: At 83, Tiburon resident Robert Moore stays active playing pickleball, adapting to new challenges after rotator-cuff surgery.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon Town Hall exhibit features art from seniors dealing with memory loss
item.description: New exhibit at Tiburon Town Hall displays artwork from seniors with dementia, highlighting healing through art and connection.
item.dc:creator: Diane Smith

item.title: Belvedere wins state approval for housing element
item.description: Rezoning is still needed for full compliance, California housing agency officials say
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Tiburon crime hits 11-year high; Belvedere’s drops to record low
item.description: Despite the town's spike in thefts, crime remains at or near historic lows on the peninsula and across California and Marin.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Hessel

item.title: Late bartender’s daughter unearths lost recipes of Tiburon Tommie’s
item.description: Bartender’s cheat sheet from Tiburon Tommie’s unearthed, revealing long-lost recipes from the iconic tiki bar’s heyday.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Artist’s View open space in Belvedere to get overlook
item.description: Belvedere approves Artist’s View platform to expand public access and island views, using grant funds despite neighbor concerns over fire risk and cost.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister
